entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Kitimat
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:47 PM PST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kitimat Forest Ave 03:00 AM PST Monday 20 February 2023
Temperature: 1.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.8 kPa falling
Humidity: 96 %
Dewpoint: 1.3°C
Wind: 0 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of rain showers or wet flurries. Low plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers this evening and after midnight. Periods of wet snow mixed with rain beginning after midnight. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 8:37 PM PST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of wet snow mixed with rain changing to snow in the morning. Snowfall amount 10 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h in the morning. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 8:37 PM PST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Snow changing to wet snow mixed with rain and ending near midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 8:37 PM PST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High zero.
